actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.
